msContents.summary: This item forms part of a manuscript containing the Eṭṭuttokai that was split into multiple parts. UVSL 1075 contains folios 68 to 113, which extends from Kuṟuntokai 2 to 401. UVSL 1076 contains the Naṟṟiṇai, as well as the kaṭavuḷ vāḻttu of the Kuṟuntokai and poem 1, on the verso of folio 67. Here, folios 67v to 113v are presented, containing the whole of the Kuṟuntokai and spanning UVSL 1076 and 1075.
